title: IDEA Assessment for State level
description: This report represents the unduplicated number of children with disabilities grades 3 through high school who participated and received a valid score in the Reading/Language Arts and Mathematics state assessments.

heading.template: In School Year {{dataView.fields.reportingYear}}, there were {{total}} children with disabilities in your State registered to participate in the Reading/Language Arts assessment.

body.template: In the reported data, {{var_1}} of children were proficient and {{var_2}} of children were not proficient in the Reading/Language Arts assessment.

In the reported data, {{var_1}} of children participated in the regular assessment without accommodations, {{var_2}} of children participated in the regular assessment with accommodations, and {{var_3}} of children did not participate in the Reading/Language Arts assessment.

content.body: This section represents the number of children with disabilities grades 3 through high school who participated and received a valid score in the Reading Language Arts assessment according to assessment type, race/ethnicity, and grade level.

value.statement: CASE WHEN assessmenttypeadministered IN ('HSREGASMTIWOACC') THEN 'REGASSWOACC' WHEN assessmenttypeadministered in ('HSREGASMTIWACC') THEN 'REGASSWACC' ELSE assessmenttypeadministered END
CASE WHEN assessmenttypeadministered IN ('HSREGASMTIWOACC') THEN 'REGASSWOACC' WHEN assessmenttypeadministered in ('HSREGASMTIWACC') THEN 'REGASSWACC' ELSE assessmenttypeadministered END
CASE WHEN gradelevel IN ('09', '10', '11', '12') THEN 'HS' ELSE gradelevel END
CASE WHEN gradelevel IN ('09', '10', '11', '12') THEN 'HS' ELSE gradelevel END

content.descriptionTemplate: There are {{proficient-total}} ({{proficient-percentage}}) of children who were proficient and {{notproficient-total}} ({{notproficient-percentage}}) of children who were not proficient in the Reading/Language Arts assessment.
content.explainTemplate: In the reported data, ({{proficient-percentage}}) of children were proficient and ({{notproficient-percentage}}) of children were not proficient in the Reading/Language Arts assessment.
content.filterDescription: Choose a section range to see specific data and insights.
content.title: All Assessment Types, Race/Ethnicity, and Grade Levels

content.body: This section represents the number of children with disabilities grades 3 through high school who were enrolled to participate in the Mathematics assessment according to race/ethnicity, and grade level.

value.statement: CASE WHEN assessmentregistrationparticipationindicator IN ('PHSRGASMIWOACC') THEN 'REGPARTWOACC' WHEN assessmentregistrationparticipationindicator in ('PHSRGASMIWACC') THEN 'REGPARTWACC' ELSE assessmentregistrationparticipationindicator END

CASE WHEN assessmentregistrationparticipationindicator IN ('PHSRGASMIWOACC') THEN 'REGPARTWOACC' WHEN assessmentregistrationparticipationindicator in ('PHSRGASMIWACC') THEN 'REGPARTWACC' ELSE assessmentregistrationparticipationindicator END
CASE WHEN gradelevel IN ('09', '10', '11', '12') THEN 'HS' ELSE gradelevel END

CASE WHEN assessmentregistrationparticipationindicator IN ('PHSRGASMIWOACC') THEN 'REGPARTWOACC' WHEN assessmentregistrationparticipationindicator in ('PHSRGASMIWACC') THEN 'REGPARTWACC' ELSE assessmentregistrationparticipationindicator END
CASE WHEN gradelevel IN ('09', '10', '11', '12') THEN 'HS' ELSE gradelevel END

CASE WHEN assessmentregistrationparticipationindicator IN ('PHSRGASMIWOACC') THEN 'REGPARTWOACC' WHEN assessmentregistrationparticipationindicator in ('PHSRGASMIWACC') THEN 'REGPARTWACC' ELSE assessmentregistrationparticipationindicator END

content.descriptionTemplate: There are {{REGPARTWOACC-total}} ({{REGPARTWOACC-percentage}}) of children participated in the regular assessment without accommodations, {{REGPARTWACC-total}} ({{REGPARTWACC-percentage}}) of children participated in the regular assessment with accommodations, {{NPART-total}} ({{NPART-percentage}}) of children did not participate, {{PARTELP-total}} ({{PARTELP-percentage}}) of children participated in the English language proficiency assessment, and {{MEDEXEMPT-total}} ({{MEDEXEMPT-percentage}}) of children had medical exemption in the Reading/Language Arts assessment.
content.explainTemplate: In the reported data, ({{REGPARTWOACC-percentage}}) of children participated in the regular assessment without accommodations, ({{REGPARTWACC-percentage}}) of children participated in the regular assessment with accommodations, and ({{NPART-percentage}}) of children did not participate in the Reading/Language Arts assessment.
content.filterDescription: Choose a section range to see specific data and insights.
